ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.169"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11309)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10275)/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10274)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11310)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10278), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.16 DYNAMIC (CONF:10279)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode (CONF:10277), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.20 DYNAMIC (CONF:10276)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:11127)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:11128)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice (CONF:11129)
This playingDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11311), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECGType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.19 DYNAMIC (CONF:11312)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.04
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11309)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10275)/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10274)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11310)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10278), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.16 DYNAMIC (CONF:10279)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode (CONF:10277), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.20 DYNAMIC (CONF:10276)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:11127)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:11128)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice (CONF:11129)
This playingDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11311), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECGType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.19 DYNAMIC (CONF:11312)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.04
